title: Track Serialized Components
description: An assembly requires several critical, serialized components. An operator needs to scan and associate each component's serial number with the main assembly's serial number.

tasks.description: Scan the serial number of the main assembly unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates the 'as-built' record for the main unit.

tasks.description: Scan the serial number of each critical component as it is installed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent scans three different component serial numbers.

tasks.description: Finalize the genealogy record, confirming that all required serialized components have been associated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent saves the completed record, creating a full traceability link between the main unit and its components.
